subject: URGENT: Your PayPal Account Has Been Limited
body:
Dear PayPal User,

We have detected suspicious activity on your account. Your account has been temporarily limited for your security.

To restore full access, please verify your identity immediately by clicking the link below:

http://paypal-secure-verify.tk/restore

Failure to verify within 24 hours will result in permanent account closure.

Thank you,
PayPal Security Team

ai_analysis.educational_focus: This email demonstrates classic phishing tactics using urgency, fake security warnings, and suspicious links.
red_flags: Suspicious shortened or foreign domain links
verification_tips: Check sender domain carefully - legitimate PayPal emails come from @paypal.com
Hover over links to see real destination
Log into PayPal directly through official website
PayPal never asks for verification via email links

subject: Your Amazon Order #AMZ-7829483 Requires Payment Update
body:
Hello,

Your recent Amazon order could not be processed due to payment issues.

Order Details:
- Order #: AMZ-7829483
- Item: iPhone 15 Pro Max
- Amount: $1,199.99

Please update your payment information to avoid order cancellation:
https://amazon-payment-update.org/secure

Regards,
Amazon Customer Service

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Demonstrates order confirmation phishing using fake high-value purchases to create urgency.
verification_tips: Check your actual Amazon account for real orders
Amazon emails come from @amazon.com domains
Never click payment links in emails
Verify orders through official Amazon app or website

subject: Microsoft Windows Security Alert - Virus Detected
body:
SECURITY ALERT

Our systems have detected multiple viruses on your computer.

Immediately download our security scan tool to remove threats:

Download: http://windows-security-fix.com/scanner.exe

Warning: Your files may be permanently damaged if not addressed within 2 hours.

Microsoft Security Team
Toll-Free Support: 1-800-123-FAKE

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Shows tech support scam tactics using fear and fake security alerts to distribute malware.
red_flags: Microsoft doesn't send virus alerts via email
verification_tips: Microsoft never sends security alerts via email
Never download executable files from emails
Use official Microsoft support channels
Run legitimate antivirus software regularly

subject: Suspicious Login Attempt - Immediate Action Required
body:
Dear Chase Customer,

We detected a login attempt from an unrecognized device:

Location: Nigeria
IP Address: 197.89.123.456
Time: March 18, 2024 3:45 AM

If this was not you, secure your account immediately:
https://chase-secure-login.net/verify

Your account will be locked in 30 minutes if no action is taken.

Chase Bank Security

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Demonstrates banking security phishing using fake login alerts and geographic scare tactics.
verification_tips: Log into your bank account directly through official website
Banks use their official domains for communications
Verify suspicious activity through official bank app
Never click verification links in emails

subject: Your Facebook Account Will Be Deleted Tomorrow
body:
Hello Facebook User,

Due to new privacy regulations, inactive accounts will be permanently deleted.

Your account has been marked for deletion on March 20, 2024.

To keep your account and all your photos/memories, verify your identity:

https://facebook-account-verification.tk/confirm

This process must be completed within 24 hours.

Facebook Team

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Shows emotional manipulation phishing using fear of losing personal data and memories.
red_flags: Facebook doesn't delete accounts without warning
verification_tips: Check Facebook notifications within the app
Facebook emails come from @facebook.com or @facebookmail.com
Log into Facebook directly to check account status
Facebook provides advance notice for policy changes

subject: Netflix Payment Failed - Service Suspended
body:
Hi there,

Your Netflix subscription payment was declined by your bank.

Your account has been temporarily suspended. To restore service:

1. Update your payment method
2. Confirm your billing information

Restore Service: https://netflix-billing.net/update

Note: Failure to update within 48 hours will result in account cancellation.

Netflix Billing Team

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Demonstrates subscription service phishing using payment failure scare tactics.
red_flags: Generic greetings instead of account holder name
verification_tips: Check your Netflix account directly through the app
Netflix sends payment reminders, not immediate suspensions
Update payment info only through official Netflix website
Verify payment status with your bank directly

subject: Apple ID Locked Due to Suspicious Activity
body:
Dear Apple Customer,

Your Apple ID has been locked due to multiple failed login attempts from an unknown device.

Device Information:
- iPhone 13 Pro
- Location: Moscow, Russia
- Date: March 21, 2024

Unlock your Apple ID now:
https://appleid-security-unlock.com/restore

Important: Your account will be permanently disabled if not verified within 12 hours.

Apple Security

phishing_indicators: Fake Apple domain with extra words
ai_analysis.educational_focus: Shows Apple ID phishing using device security alerts and geographic scare tactics.
verification_tips: Check Apple ID status through official Apple website
Apple provides secure account recovery methods
Log into iCloud directly to verify account status
Use official Apple Support app for assistance

subject: Google Account: Sign-in Blocked
body:
Hello,

We blocked a sign-in attempt to your Google Account.

Details:
- Email: user@gmail.com
- Time: March 22, 2024 10:15 AM
- Location: Lagos, Nigeria
- Device: Windows PC

If this wasn't you, secure your account:
https://google-account-recovery.org/secure

Your account may be compromised. Act immediately.

Google Account Team

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Demonstrates Google account phishing using blocked sign-in alerts and compromise fears.
verification_tips: Check Google account activity through myaccount.google.com
Google provides official security notifications
Use Google's official account recovery process
Enable two-factor authentication for added security

subject: eBay Dispute: Customer Claims Item Not Received
body:
Dear eBay Seller,

A buyer has opened a dispute claiming they never received item #394857291.

Dispute Amount: $1,247.50
Buyer: john_smith_2024
Item: MacBook Pro 16-inch

You must respond within 48 hours or funds will be automatically refunded to buyer.

Respond to Dispute: https://ebay-seller-center.net/dispute

eBay Customer Service

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Shows eBay seller phishing using fake disputes and financial pressure tactics.
verification_tips: Log into eBay seller account directly
Check eBay messages within the platform
eBay disputes are handled through official resolution center
Verify buyer information through eBay's system

subject: FRAUD ALERT: Unauthorized Transaction Detected
body:
URGENT FRAUD ALERT

We have detected a suspicious transaction on your Visa card:

Transaction Details:
- Amount: $2,899.00
- Merchant: Bitcoin Exchange
- Location: Romania
- Date: March 24, 2024

If you did not authorize this transaction, immediately secure your card:

https://visa-fraud-protection.net/secure

WARNING: Additional unauthorized charges may occur if not addressed within 1 hour.

Visa Fraud Protection

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Demonstrates credit card fraud phishing using cryptocurrency and foreign transaction fears.
verification_tips: Contact your bank directly using the number on your card
Check your actual card statements through bank app
Banks provide official fraud alert systems
Never click links in fraud alert emails

subject: Limited Time: 300% Bitcoin Investment Returns
body:
Congratulations!

You've been selected for our exclusive Bitcoin investment program.

Investment Details:
- Minimum Investment: $500
- Guaranteed Return: 300% in 30 days
- Risk Level: ZERO
- Spots Available: Only 50 remaining

Start earning today:
https://crypto-profit-max.com/invest

This offer expires in 24 hours. Don't miss out on guaranteed profits!

Crypto Investment Team

phishing_indicators: Too good to be true investment returns
ai_analysis.educational_focus: Shows cryptocurrency investment scam using unrealistic return promises and urgency.
red_flags: Guaranteed high returns are always scams
No legitimate investment has zero risk
Pressure tactics with limited time offers
verification_tips: All investments carry risk - no guarantees exist
Research any investment company thoroughly
Consult licensed financial advisors
Be skeptical of unsolicited investment offers

subject: FedEx Package Delivery Failed - Action Required
body:
Dear Customer,

Your FedEx package delivery failed due to an incorrect address.

Package Information:
- Tracking: FX-9847562301
- From: Apple Store
- Contents: iPhone 15 Pro
- Value: $1,199

To reschedule delivery and confirm your address:
https://fedex-redelivery.org/schedule

Package will be returned to sender if not rescheduled within 72 hours.

FedEx Customer Service

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Demonstrates shipping scam using fake delivery failures and valuable package claims.
verification_tips: Track packages only through official FedEx website
Verify any deliveries you're actually expecting
FedEx provides official tracking and rescheduling
Don't click links for unexpected packages

subject: WhatsApp Account Verification Required
body:
Hello WhatsApp User,

Due to new security policies, all accounts must be verified to continue using WhatsApp.

Verification Code: WA-Ver-8829341

Verify your account to avoid suspension:
https://whatsapp-verify.tk/confirm?code=WA-Ver-8829341

Unverified accounts will be deleted after 48 hours.

WhatsApp Security Team

Note: This is an automated message. Do not reply.

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Shows messaging app phishing using fake security policy changes and verification requirements.
verification_tips: WhatsApp verification happens within the app
WhatsApp doesn't use email for account verification
Check WhatsApp official communications through the app
Contact WhatsApp support through official channels

subject: IRS Tax Refund: $3,247.89 Ready for Deposit
body:
Dear Taxpayer,

Good news! You are eligible for a tax refund of $3,247.89.

Refund Processing ID: IRS-REF-2024-7829

To receive your refund quickly, please verify your banking information:

https://irs-refund-portal.net/claim

You must claim your refund within 30 days or it will be forfeited to the US Treasury.

Internal Revenue Service
Tax Refund Department

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Demonstrates tax refund scam using government impersonation and financial incentives.
red_flags: IRS doesn't initiate contact via email
verification_tips: Check refund status only through official IRS website
IRS communicates primarily through postal mail
Verify tax information through official IRS channels
Never provide banking info via email links

subject: Instagram Verification Badge Available
body:
Congratulations!

Your Instagram account has been approved for the blue verification badge.

Account: @your_username
Followers: 25,847
Engagement Rate: 4.2%

To activate your verification badge:
https://instagram-verification.net/activate

This offer is valid for 7 days only. After that, you'll need to reapply and wait 6 months.

Instagram Verification Team

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Shows social media verification scam targeting influencers and content creators.
red_flags: Verification is done through Instagram app
verification_tips: Apply for verification only through Instagram app
Instagram doesn't email about verification approvals
Check verification status within Instagram settings
Be cautious of unsolicited social media offers

subject: Spotify Premium: Payment Declined
body:
Hi,

Your Spotify Premium payment was declined.

Subscription Details:
- Plan: Premium Family
- Monthly Cost: $15.99
- Billing Date: March 30, 2024

Update your payment method to continue enjoying Premium features:

https://spotify-billing.org/update

Your account will downgrade to free tier in 24 hours if payment is not updated.

Spotify Billing Team

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Shows subscription payment scam using service downgrade fears and payment urgency.
verification_tips: Check Spotify account directly through the app
Update payment info only through official Spotify website
Spotify provides grace periods for payment issues
Verify payment status with your bank or card company

subject: LinkedIn: Your Profile Has Been Viewed 247 Times
body:
Hello Professional,

Great news! Your LinkedIn profile has been viewed 247 times this week.

Profile Views This Week:
- Recruiters: 89 views
- Hiring Managers: 124 views
- Industry Professionals: 34 views

Upgrade to LinkedIn Premium to see who viewed your profile:

https://linkedin-premium-upgrade.net/offer

Special Offer: 50% off Premium for new subscribers (expires today)

LinkedIn Professional Team

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Shows professional networking scam using career advancement and profile visibility tactics.
verification_tips: Check LinkedIn notifications within the app
Upgrade to Premium only through official LinkedIn website
Verify profile view statistics through LinkedIn dashboard
Be cautious of unsolicited professional offers

subject: Zoom Meeting Security Update Required
body:
Dear Zoom User,

Due to recent security vulnerabilities, all Zoom accounts must install a critical security update.

Security Update Details:
- Version: Zoom Security Patch 5.14.2
- Release Date: April 1, 2024
- Priority: CRITICAL

Download the security update:
https://zoom-security-update.com/download

Warning: Accounts without this update will be suspended after April 3, 2024.

Zoom Security Team

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Shows software update scam using fake security vulnerabilities to distribute malware.
verification_tips: Download Zoom updates only from official Zoom website
Check Zoom app for legitimate update notifications
Verify security news through official Zoom communications
Never download software from email links

subject: CONGRATULATIONS! You've Won $750,000 USD
body:
CONGRATULATIONS!!!

You have won the International Email Lottery!

Winning Details:
- Prize Amount: $750,000 USD
- Ticket Number: INT-2024-7829
- Draw Date: April 1, 2024
- Winning Numbers: 7, 14, 23, 31, 42, 49

To claim your prize, contact our claims agent:
Email: claims@lottery-winners.net
Phone: +44-700-123-4567

You must claim within 14 days or forfeit your winnings.

International Lottery Commission

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Classic lottery scam using large prize claims and urgency to extract personal information or fees.
red_flags: You cannot win lotteries you didn't enter
verification_tips: Legitimate lotteries require ticket purchases
Never provide personal information for unsolicited prizes
Research any lottery organization thoroughly
Be extremely skeptical of large unsolicited prizes

subject: Critical Windows Security Update - Install Now
body:
Important Security Notice

Microsoft has released a critical security update for Windows.

Update Information:
- Update ID: KB2024-CRITICAL
- Severity: CRITICAL
- Affects: All Windows versions
- CVE Score: 9.8/10

Install immediately:
https://windows-critical-update.com/install

This vulnerability allows remote attackers to take complete control of your computer.

Microsoft Windows Update Team

DO NOT DELAY - INSTALL NOW

ai_analysis.educational_focus: Shows operating system update scam using fake security vulnerabilities and fear of system compromise.
red_flags: Windows updates come through Windows Update
verification_tips: Windows updates only through Windows Update system
Microsoft doesn't email about individual updates
Verify security news through official Microsoft channels
Never download system updates from email links
